oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A new versatile strategy for C-aryl glycosides
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KALIAPPAN, KP
SUBRAHMANYAM, AV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diels-alder reaction
olefin-metathesis catalysts
enyne metathesis
carbene complexes
organic-synthesis
cross-metathesis
high-pressure
derivatives
route
1,4-benzoquinones
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A versatile strategy involving a sequential intermolecular enyne metathesis of C-alkynyl glycosides with ethylene, Diels-Alder, and aromatization reactions is successfully developed to provide a range of C-aryl glycosides.
